name: Nádine
extract: Nádine Hoffeldt (born 28 February 1982) is a South African Afrikaans pop singer and presenter, best known for the hit song "Kaapse Draai". She has also recorded a number of songs in English.
description: Nádine Hoffeldt, born 28th February 1982, is a South African Afrikaans pop singer and presenter, popularly known for her hit song "Kaapse Draai".
